channel.title: This site
channel.description:
I'm surprised this site is still around, I haven't been here since servers were released :) Glad to see this site is up and running I learned a lot here.
To any moderator or admin reading this feel free to remove this topic, I vain I is clearly a try hard who tries to hard to be a secondhand moderator.... he ruined the post, ohwell, have fun with the poll I added after he choose to just not shut the fuck up.

item.title: This site
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I remember you, you moderated a few old raps sites. At one point you may have moderated over at silabsofts forums and it’s possible your a vet on runelocus but I’m not positive.

If I recall correctly though, you never contributed anything to the scene in terms of code or advancement.

Read full topic

Shut up all of you.

item.title: This site
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

That’s fine I know if Silabsoft sees it she won’t ban me or mute me, and even if she does she knows I won’t care or have hard feelings she can do her job, doesn’t effect me to be muted on a site I don’t use anymore. If I really wanted to I’d just VPN myself a new account. Anyone else who sees it can do whatever I’ve already sent the person i needed to message my contact details. My job here is done.

P.S. Thanks Mista good looks.

Read full topic

item.title: This site
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:23, topic:401769”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=498827.msg3647889#msg3647889 date=1309523209]
Hey m8, listen, just some advice, I’d remove the poll if I was you because you will get muted guaranteed, remove before it’s to late.
[/quote]
Even if he does remove it I have a screen shot and the site also saves things like that for 36 hours, I don’t like kids like this on this site.[/quote]Screenshot? Hahahahah, really, lol, I’m not going to explain.

[quote=“krackkid, post:21, topic:401769”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=498827.msg3647903#msg3647903 date=1309523495]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=498827.msg3647898#msg3647898 date=1309523395]

[quote author=Rash link=topic=498827.msg3647896#msg3647896 date=1309523368]
Dude, your so cool.
[/quote]He has 10rep so he is a noob.
[/quote]Now he has 23.
[/quote]Proves rep abuse is cool.[/quote]Euhm, who said anything about rep abuse, he earned my respect so I repped him?

Read full topic

I’m here mostly to speak to one person once she answers my PMs I really don’t care bout this vain nerb.

item.title: This site
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I haven’t failed at anything. If you want to congratulate MITB on his continuing of running the site, send him a PM. You want to see if people remember you? Go to IRC or PM them. You clearly don’t know the rules, so:
1: Go read them.
2: Lose the cocky-ass attitude.
3: Shut the fuck up.[/quote]
+1

Read full topic

item.title: This site
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I haven’t failed at anything. If you want to congratulate MITB on his continuing of running the site, send him a PM. You want to see if people remember you? Go to IRC or PM them. You clearly don’t know the rules, so:
1: Go read them.
2: Lose the cocky-ass attitude.
3: Shut the fuck up.[/quote]

Bro I read em again just for you, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342270.0.html

Clearly it’s you who doesn’t know the rules you said there’s a rule against posting come back threads. kindly peace out of my thread I’m done I still haven’t done anything to be considered really flaming, although you kind of are flame baiting. Why can’t we just get along, kitten tits? You seem so mad.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,365887.0.html < You mean these rules? Meh either way as said this isn’t a coming back topic. so…I may be a dickhead…

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

Read full topic

item.title: This site
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=l3etal3lade link=topic=498827.msg3647811#msg3647811 date=1309514455]
This isn’t a coming back topic either? Its a compliment topic to mopar for keeping the site running through the years you god damn try hard. you can’t win with me… and 16 damn… I almost said 8 - 16 either way your post count on this site is not = your penis size in real life or online, so I really suggest you just stop typing on this topic, you’re only wasting your own time.

But yeah where in this at all did I say I was coming back, just cuzz I logged in after 7 years doesn’t mean I’m back for good. It means I’m waiting for a reply from someone more important than you…
[/quote]You said it was to see if people remembered you. To remember you, you had to have left. If you didn’t ever leave, they wouldn’t have forgotten you. As you did leave, and now you are back, this is technically a coming back topic. Clearly you don’t know anything. Oh? The common e-penis -> post count shit. You’re so immature. Read the rules, and fuck off.[/quote]

Guy I bet I know the rules better then you now the general point of this post is to congratulate mopar, the secondary reason is simply to see if anyone I remember posts, that giveaway being simply my username tagged to the post, idiot, so technically its only a come back topic by default… so if you really want to go down that road its a loophole and you failed again. Go cut yourself and fall in a puddle of aids.

[quote=“Tu, post:7, topic:401769”][quote author=l3etal3lade link=topic=498827.msg3647811#msg3647811 date=1309514455]
This isn’t a coming back topic either? Its a compliment topic to mopar for keeping the site running through the years you god damn try hard. you can’t win with me… and 16 damn… I almost said 8 - 16 either way your post count on this site is not = your penis size in real life or online, so I really suggest you just stop typing on this topic, you’re only wasting your own time.

But yeah where in this at all did I say I was coming back, just cuzz I logged in after 7 years doesn’t mean I’m back for good. It means I’m waiting for a reply from someone more important than you…
[/quote]
not trying to to intrude on this prideful ranting you have going on here but you are by far the the biggest net douche i have ever seen posting on the internet[/quote]

I learned from the very best and I’m proud of it, thanks bro. Haters gonna hate.

Read full topic

item.title: This site
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

This is general discussion bro, you are the only uneeded part of this topic. Thanks this is for members who may remember me, not you. Theres no introduction section otherwise it would be there, but this technically isn’t an introduction either, but either way. I know I’m older then you, I can guarantee your around the frail tender age of like 8-14 MAYBE… why don’t you just fuck off. I flamed cuzz you spammed. and I didn’t really flame you… I flamed your mom.

Just saying I hate little kids, you think you’re an internet tough guy, wait til you get a bit older and piss of some people who are gonna find out your IP, and where you live, and do some really nasty stuff.

Moparscape General Discussion

A general discussion board. Chat about anything, but please don’t post questions here.

Clearly the need of this topic is not of such for you to decide. Sorry, try harder next time.
